attributes.action: Relieve pensioners from paying council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned believe it is a pensioners right, to not have to pay council tax as they have worked hard all there life and on a state pension cannot humanly affored the !over! priced council tax local councils fors on them!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
